Author: townpeachcollector
Text: Thank you, I appreciate your reply. I’ve been going to a therapist on and off for a while and it’s had no impact so i dunno.  Honestly you’ve brightened my day, you’re right, I just need to keep reaching out.

Author: XMuah
Text: There is nothing wrong with seeing a therapist or doing inpatient.  Boys, especially young ones are... well, dumb. It’s not that he isn’t concerned, it’s just that he doesn’t get it. (Also super no offense to males going through this, I know you get it... and I’m sorry... I’d say the same thing about girls who aren’t going through similar things.)  You’ve got a big future ahead of you, please keep going.   This disease is a lot to handle, keep asking for help until someone gets it. It’s ok, even if you don’t feel this way, you’re worth it.
